column1: '''Primrose Bracegirdle, née Boffin''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Primrose was the daughter of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. She married [[Blanco Bracegirdle]] and had two children, [[Bruno Bracegirdle

column2: Primrose]] (from Latin ''primula'' and English ''rose'') are plants of the [[wikipedia:primula
